overview.address: National Institute of Technology, Tanjore Main Road, National Highway 67, Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu - 620015

mode_of_admission.mode_of_admission: Candidates must appear for the JEE (Main) exam and either secure at least 75% marks (65% for SC/ST/PwD) in Class XII or be within the category-wise top 20 percentile in their respective Class XII board examination. For more details, refer to the JEE Main Performance Criteria in Class XII.

fee_waiver.point 1: 100% Tuition Fee waiver for SC/ST/PwD students.
fee_waiver.point 2: 100% Tuition Fee remission for Most Economically Backward students with family income less than ₹1 lakh per annum.
fee_waiver.point 3: 2/3rd Tuition Fee remission for Other Economically Backward students with family income between ₹1 lakh to ₹5 lakh per annum.
